snippet: The country’s athletics federation suspended Volare Sports and Rosa & Associati for six months as it investigated a spike in doping among runners.
abstract: Kenya's athletics federation suspends sports agencies Volare Sports and Rosa & Associati from working in country for six months as it investigates rise in doping among runners.
lead_paragraph: The country’s athletics federation suspended Volare Sports and Rosa & Associati for six months as it investigated a spike in doping among runners.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Running; Kenya Bans 2 Companies
